modules.description: Handles email composition and delivery through configured backends, supporting SMTP, SendGrid, and Mailgun. Operates on structured email data including sender, recipient, subject, and body. Used to send transactional emails, notifications, and automated messages across different service providers.

Handles email sending via Sendgrid's API using a configured HTTP post function. Operates on email data structures and configuration records containing API keys and endpoints. Used to dispatch transactional emails with customizable HTTP behavior for testing or proxy scenarios.
